gaia::graphics::PaintFlagsDrawFilter Class Reference

Subclass of DrawFilter that affects every paint by first clearing the specified clearBits in the paint's flags, and then setting the specified setBits in the paint's flags. More...

#include <PaintFlagsDrawFilter.h>

Detailed Description

Subclass of DrawFilter that affects every paint by first clearing the specified clearBits in the paint's flags, and then setting the specified setBits in the paint's flags.

Subclass of DrawFilter that affects every paint by first clearing the specified clearBits in the paint's flags, and then setting the specified setBits in the paint's flags. 


Parameters:

  

    
clearBitsThese bits will be cleared in the paint's flags 

    
setBitsThese bits will be set in the paint's flags
